title: Ahri is at a 60% Win rate

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body:
Diamond+/NA
https://i.gyazo.com/482fe67ce9381f32bc7f97303a083b27.png
https://u.gg/lol/champions/ahri/build/?region=na1&rank=diamond_plus

Edit : The site update and now it's 52.79%

replies.body:
I've been saying this for literal months.
She is BROKEN as heck. I even got 3% winrate gain JUST by banning ahri because of her insane pickrate/winrate.
It is NOT because of glacial augment, ANY mage in this patch can build it.

She is the "autofill warwick" of midlane.
Maining a champ that is sucessfull for autofill feel bad :(
tfw a champ is so broken that her mains even want her nerfed

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4f4o6a3j,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-03T13:27:19.901+0000)
>
> tfw a champ is so broken that her mains even want her nerfed

I want her at 100% win rate.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4f4o6a3j,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-03T13:27:19.901+0000)
>
> tfw a champ is so broken that her mains even want her nerfed

Nah we just want her to be nerfed so we can peacefully play her without getting picked or banned like the old days , but instead they nerfed the wrong part , not like we like the E buff that boosted her winrate , simply just revert her e buff and all will be good , I myself wanted her to be nerfed so I can stop seeing people keeping the circle jerking about her

if anything glacial augment is,actually 55% WR in diamond+

(also looking at the screen the data is on 93 matches)

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox9T,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4f4o6a3j,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-03T11:53:30.053+0000)
>
> if anything glacial augment is,actually 55% WR in diamond+
> 
> (also looking at the screen the data is on 93 matches)

Umm 93 is a very and I mean very small number is say somthig is strong like its more of a match up thing then it being good that would also explain the wirate too since ahri has around 11% playrate and glacial augments takes up about 30% of that so its about 3.3% of players are using it so its most likely just being played for a match up its good into.

>Umm 93 is a very and I mean very small number 

yeah that's what i meant

>then it being good that would also explain the wirate too since ahri has around 11% playrate and glacial augments takes up about 30% of that so its about 3.3% of players are using it so its most likely just being played for a match up its good into.

just saying,glacial augment build have almost 30% pick rate and 55% win rate in diamond+,while the electrocute build is between 50% and 51% win rate

definitely the champ and not the build

> [{quoted}](name=wildfox9T,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4f4o6a3j,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-10-03T14:58:10.341+0000)
>
> yeah that's what i meant
> 
> just saying,glacial augment build have almost 30% pick rate and 55% win rate in diamond+,while the electrocute build is between 50% and 51% win rate
> 
> definitely the champ and not the build

Umm your being disingenuous the build does not have a 30% playrate it has a 3.3% playrate and my point was that the numbers are too small to compare to winrates and its most likely being played only as a counter not because its good since if it was good it would have a higher playrate but since its so small thats mostly not the case.
Shes not 60+%. The site cannot physically be credible if it claims such. Her mains, maybe. Most mains in higher elo get 60-70%+ win rates on their mains.
My only issue is that she can push too easily early. Would've prefered a slight mana cost increase on her Q.
